entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
